casebody.data:
EMPIRE BRICK & SUPPLY CO., Libelant-Appellee, v. James C. DAVIS, Director General of Railroads, as Agent (Pennsylvania Railroad), Respondent-Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 5, 1924.) No. 330. Burlingham, Yeeder, Masten & Fearey, of New York City (Chauncey I. Clark and Carl (5. Stearns, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Alexander & Ash, of New York City (Peter Alexander, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before ROGERS, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM

Decree (300 Fed. 683) affirmed.
